explanation: Funds are realigned within the Aircraft Procurement, Air Force 23/23 appropriation from line ‘ item B02100, B-21 Raider to line item B02100, B-21 Raider, Advanced Procurement, to mitigate the impact ' of inflation on FY 2023 obligations for long lead items under the B-21 Rader contract, which is an Advance Procurement requirement. This does not change the purpose for which the funds were appropriated.

Funds are realigned within the Aircraft Procurement, Air Force 23/23 appropriation from line item B02100, B-21 Raider to line item B02100, B-21 Raider, Advanced Procurement for the proper ‘execution of section 8121 funding provided in the 2023 Department of Defense Appropriations Act. Funds will be used to purchase long lead items for the B-21 Rader contract, which is an Advance Procurement requirement, which can be executed before funds expire at the end of the fiscal year. This does not change the purpose for which the funds were appropriated.
